page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our block is very much a rural area. There is only one main centre of housing and that is the village of Ashton.About 2 km to the north of Ashton is Mouldsworth village and part of Manley but these areas are far more scattered.The rest of our area is farmland with a number of farms here and there.Through the very centre of our block runs the main Chester to Manchester railway line.There is one passenger station at Mouldsworth. The village of Ashton is split into two halves by the main road, most of the community buildings are situated along this main road, and they include the school, the parish church, the community centre and the W.I.hall. Ashton is a nice quiet village, it is set in the countryside.It is very good for spotting animals like badgers and foxes.
